lines.text: What did you do that for? Poor soul! You shattered the big ebony phallus! Poor soul! Misery is now your lot!
Poor soul! Beyond words! You must get away from here. You'll fry in your own hell, believe me. Ask me no questions, just get away from here.
If you want to see Herminia, you'd better hurry up.
Why, what's the matter with her?

[after seeing Christina swimming nude]
You shouldn't go around showing your ass!
